entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app #29571
  • dotnet run command not listening on https #29569
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web for Android #29567
    Discussion
  • `-interactive` switch is accepted, although only `--interactive` works #29564
    Backlog

Closed

  • Installing .net 7 on 20.04 should give error instead of silently install and not worked. #29184
    Discussion
  • Sdk tooling target framework should be net8.0 #29087
  • dotnet test /clp:ErrorsOnly not working after upgrade to 7.0.101 #29542

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29585
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.0.1xx backport) #29584
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.3xx. backport) #29583
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.1xx backport) #29579
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Merge pull request #28707 from JanKrivanek/template-verifier #29568
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #29470
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded to the current framework #29566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Pull razor dependencies from consolidate repo #29374
    Area-CodeFlow, 7.0.2xx
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration #29540
  • Improve generation of nested type symbols. #29552
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.0.2xx backport) #29549
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.4xx backport) #29548
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Area-DotNet Test
  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • add class template #29518
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Common templates
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
